1.1.name: wordpress/adsense-daemon
1.1.description:
The simplest solution to integrate "Google Adsense" into Wordpress Content. Just copy your Google Adsense code, paste it and configure where you want to display.

  1. 10+ pre-define display options.
  • Append adsense with Left Float Content
  • Append adsense with Right Float Content
  • Append adsense Before Content
  • Append adsense After Content
  • Append adsense After 1 - 10 paragraph
  • Append adsense with random paragraph

  1. Display only for posts published after xx days. (configurable).

  2. Do not display ads to users from certain website e.g digg.com, dzone.com (configratable).

  3. Do not display ads to certain post caregory e.g feature, tutorials (configratable).
